Package com.amplifyframework.core.reachability

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Host
    A host is a model of some remote system that we may or may not be able to reach over a network.
    Reachability
    Reachability refers to whether or not the client is able to reach a system over a network.
    Reachability.OnHostReachableAction
    An action that gets performed when a host is determined to be reachable.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PeriodicReachabilityChecker
    PeriodicReachabilityChecker is a utility to determine whether or not a host is reachable.
    SocketHost
    A Host whose reachability is determined by opening an Internet socket against a hostname / port number pair.
